meanings.definition: The quality of being naturally talented or skilled in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: Her giftedness in painting was evident from a young age.
meanings.sent2: His giftedness in music allowed him to compose beautiful melodies.
meanings.sent3: The giftedness of the dog in finding hidden treats amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: The giftedness of the sun in providing warmth to the earth is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The giftedness of the chef in creating delicious dishes made him famous.

meanings.definition: The state of possessing exceptional intelligence or abilities.
meanings.sent1: The student's giftedness in mathematics led to advanced problem-solving skills.
meanings.sent2: Her giftedness in leadership made her a natural choice for the position.
meanings.sent3: The giftedness of the robot in completing tasks quickly impressed the team.
meanings.sent4: The giftedness of the wind in carrying seeds across vast distances is vital for plant growth.
meanings.sent5: His giftedness in storytelling captivated audiences wherever he went.
